Quote.Author: Ellie Goulding
Quote.QuoteValue: I can fall in love in a simple way, but I can dissect it in such an intense fashion when it ends

Quote.Author: Ellie Goulding
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the most powerful feelings in the world is after a really, really long run

Quote.Author: Ellie Goulding
Quote.QuoteValue: What people don't understand is that how you are as an artist depends on how you are emotionally

Quote.Author: Ellie Goulding
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm never happy with my face, my hair, I haven't really got any boobs and I'm not really that tall

Quote.Author: Ellie Goulding
Quote.QuoteValue: Christmas in L.A. is weird. There's no snow. It's not even cold

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: America was not founded to improve health care or housing; it was founded for freedom

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: The intersection of religion and world politics has often been a bloody crossroads

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: At the United Nations, a lynch mob for Israel is always just a moment away

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: Honduras was the original 'banana republic,' and its poverty remains extreme

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: A Palestinian state will never be created by terror

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: The notion that public service requires men and women of good character now seems quaint

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: The devastation of the ancient Christian community in Iraq is well known

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: When freedom of the press is threatened, the United States should be leading efforts to protect it

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: The best-armed and best-trained divisions of the Syrian army are Alawite

Quote.Author: Elliott Abrams
Quote.QuoteValue: Gadhafi's vicious regime has left Libya far worse than he found it on the day of his coup in 1969

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Be sure to take the lens cap off before photographing

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll always be an amateur photographer

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Photography is pretty simple stuff. You just react to what you see, and take many, many pictures

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: A visual sense is something you either have or you don't

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: My 'work' is about seeing not about ideas

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: The advantage of taking pictures of the famous is that they get published

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: If your subjects are eternal... they'll survive

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: Most photographers work best alone, myself included

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: I've been around so long, most editors think I'm dead

Quote.Author: Elliott Erwitt
Quote.QuoteValue: I like museums in Berlin a lot, especially in the eastern part. They're extraordinarily good

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If you play acoustic guitar you're the depressed, sensitive guy

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: It's a lot easier to tell the truth usually

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I was coming off of a lot of psyche meds and other things

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: But I was also doing odd jobs around Portland, like spreading gravel and transplanting bamboo trees

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Because God only knows why people like what they like and don't like something else

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't have a hard time making it, I had a hard time letting it go

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I was trying to do the same thing that I always do which is make an interesting record

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: It's just that a lot of songs that are popular right now, they don't have any meaning

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: And I'm not trying to write heavy songs

Quote.Author: Elliott Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just writing songs about how I feel or about how people I know feel

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't labor over my drawings. I want to get freedom in the line

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I always felt that a painted edge between two colors was a depiction somehow

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't like mixed colors that much, like plum color or deep, deep colors that are hard to define

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always wanted... I wanted to give people joy

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm constantly investigating nature - nature, meaning everything

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not want windows, only skylights. I chose my painting wall as it has the best morning light

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: I like silence

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: The negative is just as important as the positive

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Time has always been very important in my work

Quote.Author: Ellsworth Kelly
Quote.QuoteValue: Geometry is moribund. I want a lilt and joy to art

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: I think acting is a work of imagination

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: A first love is something that lasts forever in your heart. It's something that marks you

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I'm not a student of Snake Eyes, but we trained in the same dojo

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a black belt in karate. I grew up on the outskirts of Paris, and it was rough

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: The Asian culture has to be a part of what we see on TV and in movies

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't see myself as exotic

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: Marvel's very secretive, and I'm not hiding anything, I'm not lying; it's just the way they are

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't want to make a caricature version of Elektra

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the Elektra I tried to portray: one that's always in the grey. She is a tortured soul

Quote.Author: Elodie Yung
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't identify 100% with your character

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: I never thought of myself as being handsome or good-looking or whatever

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no one to leave the money to. I'm a single man. I like spending my money

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always wanted to smash a guitar over someone's head. You just can't do that with a piano

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: Music has healing power. It has the ability to take people out of themselves for a few hours

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a very wealthy man

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of money stashed away, but I do live my life from day to day

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very generous

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: I've only been interested in the artistic side of life

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: I was more ashamed that I couldn't work the washing machine than the fact that I was taking drugs

Quote.Author: Elton John
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the most well-known homosexual in the world

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to be disgusted; now I try to be amused

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no such thing as an original sin

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: I find humming is very useful

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I write notes that I have difficulty singing

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: Women hear rhythm differently than men

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: My ultimate vocation in life is to be an irritant

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: Life for me is about movement

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: I've worked hard, every single day since I left school. I think I have a Protestant work ethic

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness isn't a fortune in a cookie. It's deeper, wider, funnier, and more transporting than that

Quote.Author: Elvis Costello
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never felt British. I'm just not interested in national identity. I don't know why

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Performance art is really more of a command than an invitation

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Boat Trip' is more tiresome and dumb than actually bad

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: The Wachowskis' use of space rivals that of musical directors like Gene Kelly and Mark Sandrich

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Probably the worst thing that ever happened to the movies was the megahit

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: There are storytelling traditions that come from Africa that are unique from anywhere else

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Just the idea of seeing a type of narrative we've not seen before is a chance to be surprised

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: The kind of filmmaking excitement that director Peter Weir brings to movies is bone deep

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: It is fun to see a comedy in which every single joke hasn't been packed into the trailer

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Duncan Jones has skills; he's an architect of emotional dislocation

Quote.Author: Elvis Mitchell
Quote.QuoteValue: Who would ever have thought that Robert Ludlum would have become the father of modern action cinema?

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: If you think big, then it's going to be big

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't follow your dream, who will?

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite Aspen memory is saving an upside-down cake that had exploded from the high altitude

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: My family... always had the value of the family table and these cultural influences of growing up

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: Mom ran the house, so we grew up Portuguese

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: I had these recipes that say do this, do that. Who MAKES these rules?

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: If somebody has a chance to put my food in their mouth, that tells the story

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: In the restaurant it's much more serious

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: I think many cooks are afraid of undercooked meats. A good thermometer is a cook's best friend

Quote.Author: Emeril Lagasse
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't limit myself

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: We are afraid of the enormity of the possible

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: A golden rule: to leave an incomplete image of oneself

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: We understand God by everything in ourselves that is fragmentary, incomplete, and inopportune

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: What would be left of our tragedies if an insect were to present us his?

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: Ennui is the echo in us of time tearing itself apart

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: Our first intuitions are the true ones

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: The Universal view melts things into a blur

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: Speech and silence. We feel safer with a madman who talks than with one who cannot open his mouth

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: Philosophy: Impersonal anxiety; refuge among anemic ideas

Quote.Author: Emile M. Cioran
Quote.QuoteValue: The fear of being deceived is the vulgar version of the quest for Truth

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: If I cannot overwhelm with my quality, I will overwhelm with my quantity

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: If you ask me what I came into this life to do, I will tell you: I came to live out loud

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: The thought is a deed. Of all deeds she fertilizes the world most

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: One forges one's style on the terrible anvil of daily deadlines

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: If you shut up truth, and bury it underground, it will but grow

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: The artist is nothing without the gift, but the gift is nothing without work

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: In my view you cannot claim to have seen something until you have photographed it

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: I am an artist... I am here to live out loud

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it

Quote.Author: Emile Zola
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfection is such a nuisance that I often regret having cured myself of using tobacco

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really old-fashioned. An Epsom salt bath, that's genuinely better than any massage

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned more doing 'Breakfast at Tiffany's' than I did during three years at drama school

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: Personally, I'd like as many children as I can pop out, I reckon

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: Croatia has been glorious - it's so beautiful, and I want to go back as often as I can

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: All of the press and stuff - that's the scary stuff. The acting is what I got trained to do

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: My rule is never to look at anything on the Internet

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: I came out of my mum's stomach going, 'I want to be an actor!'

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up around horses, but acting and riding on camera is a whole different thing

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just a girl who loves mascara

Quote.Author: Emilia Clarke
Quote.QuoteValue: The '90s were really just bad for fashion and hair

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I always say, 'Do you have a body? Then you're swimsuit ready.' That's all you need to worry about

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Nudity isn't something people should take offense to

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Your body is your body; it's natural. Learn to love yourself for it

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was a little girl, I loved theater a lot and I was always playing and making my own worlds

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm more of a Smithwick's or Bulmer's girl than a pint of Guinness

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I love men's butts

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't go out that much - usually it's just dinner

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman can be seeking attention and also make a statement.They don't need to be mutually exclusive

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: I genuinely hit puberty before everyone

Quote.Author: Emily Ratajkowski
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't feel good in the bathing suit, you're not going to look good

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: The most violent element in society is ignorance

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: All claims of education notwithstanding, the pupil will accept only that which his mind craves

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: Before we can forgive one another, we have to understand one another

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: If I can't dance, I don't want to be part of your revolution

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: If voting changed anything, they'd make it illegal

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: The motto should not be: Forgive one another; rather understand one another

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: The political arena leaves one no alternative, one must either be a dunce or a rogue

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: When we can't dream any longer we die

Quote.Author: Emma Goldman
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone has said that it requires less mental effort to condemn than to think

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think women should wear whatever makeup they want for themselves. Makeup should be fun

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not very computer savvy

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: If I feel strongly about anything, I get overwhelmed with emotion

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: You won't hear me saying I have no body issues because I wouldn't be human if I didn't

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never played someone where I felt it was beneficial to build from the outside in

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I think there are plenty of soulmates out there. That's what I choose to believe

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is PG-13 sometimes, and I really want Josh Grogan to propose to me, and he just won't do it

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because I don't have a college degree doesn't mean I am not smart!

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like grammar. And spelling. I was a spelling-bee kid. I'm hard-core about grammar

Quote.Author: Emma Stone
Quote.QuoteValue: Drama is hard for me. Crying is much harder for me than laughter

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want other people to decide who I am. I want to decide that for myself

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: All I can do is follow my instincts, because I'll never please everyone

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: If anyone else played Hermione, it would actually kill me

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel like a voodoo doll. It's grim. It's gross

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a perfectionist, so my bossiness definitely comes out

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I really want to write a novel. I also want to learn to play the mandolin

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: My cinematic crush has been pretty much the same since I was 12: Kevin Costner

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: My idea of sexy is that less is more. The less you reveal the more people can wonder

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I really love animals and enjoy working with them

Quote.Author: Emma Watson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got about eight pairs of shoes, and that's it

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: To create greater convergence, we need more intergration

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: We're not isolated from the world. The world knocks on our door

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: If approval was a criterion in this country, nothing would ever get done

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: My key message is be innovative, be ambitious; think global and big on day one

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: The refugee crisis shows we can't be isolated from the world's geopolitical troubles

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: You can block a marriage, but you cannot force a marriage

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: Popularity isn't my compass. Unless it can help one to act, to be understood... that's what counts

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: A Left that does nothing achieves nothing

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: If I was British, I would vote resolutely 'remain' because it's in the U.K.'s interest

Quote.Author: Emmanuel Macron
Quote.QuoteValue: Without investment, you cannot have jobs

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: A computer once beat me at chess, but it was no match for me at kick boxing

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: My classmates would copulate with anything that moved, but I never saw any reason to limit myself

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: Some mornings, it's just not worth chewing through the leather straps

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: You know what I hate? Indian givers... no, I take that back

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: I discovered my wife in bed with another man, and I was crushed. So I said, 'Get off me, you two!'

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother was like a sister to me, only we didn't have sex quite so often

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: How many people here have telekenetic powers? Raise my hand

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: I once had a large gay following, but I ducked into an alleyway and lost him

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: I was sleeping the other night, alone, thanks to the exterminator

Quote.Author: Emo Philips
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, my brother says Hello. So, hooray for speech therapy

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: Emigration is always a difficulty

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: The best recording is the one you bring with you in your mind

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: Irish people are pragmatic. They understand that nobody is going to fix our problems but ourselves

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: My wife, Fionnuala, and I have been married for more than 20 years

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the key drivers of Ireland's future is our balance of trade surplus

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: We have a very long legal system with the European Union, and we're English speaking

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: People put dates on any kind of comment that you make

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: Conservation is important... water comes at a cost

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: I intend to serve a full term as Taoiseach

Quote.Author: Enda Kenny
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never accuse the Irish people of being in any way stupid

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: Behind every crime is a story of sadness

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: I see myself as a family man

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: Whenever there are some who have more opportunities than others, this feeds corruption

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: Education reform has as its main purpose to make sure that the education delivered is of quality

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: Mexico is a mosaic of different realities and beauties

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe the conditions are very favorable for Mexico to grow. I'm very optimistic

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe the state needs to control hydrocarbons

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no doubt a president has to govern for everyone

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: The state is obliged to fight corruption within the government

Quote.Author: Enrique Pena Nieto
Quote.QuoteValue: Ah, 'The Departed' is really good

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of living well and the art of dying well are one

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: If thou wilt make a man happy, add not unto his riches but take away from his desires

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: It is folly for a man to pray to the gods for that which he has the power to obtain by himself

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is enough for the man to whom enough is too little

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: Not what we have But what we enjoy, constitutes our abundance

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: The misfortune of the wise is better than the prosperity of the fool

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: Justice... is a kind of compact not to harm or be harmed

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as justice in the abstract; it is merely a compact between men

Quote.Author: Epicurus
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not so much need the help of our friends as the confidence of their help in need

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very much a bit of a ghost presence

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: I think luck gets you on to the stage. But it has nothing to do with keeping you there

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: My chosen exercise is cycling. I just love it

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always reading and looking around for the next thing

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess subconsciously that all the great people you work with have an influence on you

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I wasted a lot of my youth, falling for girls who were a couple of years older than me

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: I would never say never to returning to comedy

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: I've given no thought to moving to America at all

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: I deliberately fly in and out of LA for as small a time as humanly possible

Quote.Author: Eric Bana
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't study Greek mythology in school and I wish I had

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: He who has regrets cannot look at himself in the mirror

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: My best moment? I have a lot of good moments but the one I prefer is when I kicked the hooligan

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: When the seagulls follow the trawler, it is because they think sardines will be thrown into the sea

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: If someone is too perfect they won't look good. Imperfection is important

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't take life so seriously... I can just play with life

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I have a sense of mischief and that I can laugh at myself

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: Even as a footballer, I was always being creative

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't study; I live

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: I prefer to play and lose rather than win, because I know in advance I'm going to win

Quote.Author: Eric Cantona
Quote.QuoteValue: I try to find different ways of expressing myself. Without that I will die

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: I am, and always will be, a blues guitarist

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: I like solitude. I like the anomalous life. I like a quiet life

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have half the nerves there that I have anywhere else

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to knock an audience cold with one note, but what do you do for the rest of the evening?

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the most beneficial things I've ever learned is how to keep my mouth shut

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: Risk is trying to control something you are powerless over

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if I believe in luck. I think I'm very fortunate

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: An obsession is where something will not leave your mind

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: Well, I think part of my gift, or if I have one, is that I love listening

Quote.Author: Eric Clapton
Quote.QuoteValue: Music became a healer for me

Quote.Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are the keys of paradise

Quote.Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote.QuoteValue: Propaganda does not deceive people; it merely helps them to deceive themselves

Quote.Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest arithmetic to master is that which enables us to count our blessings

Quote.Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to predict the future is to have power to shape the future

Quote.Author: Eric Hoffer
Quote.QuoteValue: Far more crucial than what we know or do not know is what we do not want to know
